pages.text: The Caduceus is the $(l:bewitchment:creatures/baphomet)Baphomet's$() tool of choice.$(br2)It has multiple-tool functionality comparable to Netherite. It can also be used to throw powerful fireballs at the cost of some $(l:bewitchment:introduction/altars#internalme)ME$().$(br2)The Caduceus can be repaired with Netherite Ingots.
